short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Update your NameCheap dynamic DNS automatically.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DDNS Client For NameCheap lets you automatically update the dynamic dns settings of any of your domains managed at namecheap.com.

This app was created independently and is not affiliated with Name Cheap.
